description:
Why big tech companies suck right now. Looking at you Amazon, Netflix, Uber, Spotify, Facebook, Snapchat, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube...Secure your privacy with Surfshark! Enter coupon code BOSS for an extra 3 months free at https://surfshark.deals/BOSS

title: How Subscription Services are designed to BANKRUPT you.
